column2: an A.M. Eatery////I give the food an A+
column3: but the service only a C+. My husband ordered the breakfast sandwich
column4: with egg and sausage. I ordered the ginger pancakes. Both meals were very good
column5: and the portions are huge. However the service was lacking. At one point I went to the bathroom and saw our waiter looking at his paycheck with another employee
column6: and talking about their hours/pay. However our waters and my coffee had been empty for quite a while. We finally just grabbed another waiter to help us. I would visit again
column7: as some other servers seemed more on top of things at their tables
